            FACILITATION PROJECT IN SOUTHEAST EUROPE,TF039898-ROMANIA-TRANSPORT AND TRADE
            FACILITIES IN SE EUROPE

abstracts.cdata!:
The Trade and Transport Facilitation in
            Southeast Europe Project seeks two development objectives:
            to reduce non-tariff costs to trade and transport, and, to
            reduce smuggling, and corruption at border crossings. To
            this end, the components will: 1) include technical services
            to coordinate, and integrate modernization elements, and
            donor contributions aimed at supporting processes changes;
            technical services to review law, regulations, and
            guidelines to fulfill customs functions, while facilitating
            legitimate trade, in cooperation with other agencies;
            technical services to support the introduction of a
            preventive and enforcement service in the Federal Customs
            Administration (FCA); technical services to introduce new
            customs procedures, supported by training; technical
            services to strengthen human resource management; and,
            equipment to improve efficiency of checks; 2) support the
            FCA, and Montenegrin Customs Administration (MCA)
            information system improvement, through consulting services,
            training, and equipment to establish a fully functional
            customs system. This includes technical services for
            business processes, for solution specification, software
            development and integration, for technical training,
            telecommunications equipment, as well as hardware and
            software to migrate to an open platform; 3) provide training
            to road transport operators, custom brokers, and traders
            through local government, and professional associations;
            provide distance learning programs, and support trade
            facilitation, built on public-private partnerships; and, 4)
            provide training for procurement and financial management
            through advisory services.
